name: earth-power
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's defensive stats.
